entries.content:
TabRenderer ultra-modular refactoring completed successfully!

BEFORE:
- 144-line monolithic TabRenderer with 5 mixed concerns

AFTER:
- 84-line orchestrator TabRenderer
- 6 focused micro-components (28+53+71+56+27+27 = 262 lines)
- Total: 346 lines (includes imports/docs)

ARCHITECTURE:
TabRenderer.js (orchestrator)
└── tab-renderer/
    ├── DOMInitializer.js (container initialization)
    ├── RenderCoordinator.js (render loop orchestration)
    └── builders/
        ├── TabElementBuilder.js (complete tab assembly)
        ├── TabContentBuilder.js (title + badge)
        ├── NewChatButtonBuilder.js (new chat button)
        └── HistoryButtonBuilder.js (history button)

KEY BENEFITS:
✅ Single responsibility - each component ONE job
✅ Testable - builders independently testable
✅ Reusable - builders can be used elsewhere
✅ Maintainable - easy to find/modify functionality
✅ Zero breaking changes - same public API
✅ Right-sized - appropriate complexity level
